title: putty后台怎么重启 开服 关服
author: wuyayun0905
txt_content: 开服给的后台是 putty的 指令文本我弄丢了   哪位大神告诉下 重启 开服  关服 指令啊！

replies.author: 602844218qq
replies.txt_content:
xjboss 发表于 2014-10-24 07:40
.restart .unhold .hold

关闭.restart 开启.unhold 重启.hold

replies.author: 602844218qq
replies.txt_content:
xjboss 发表于 2014-10-24 07:40
.restart .unhold .hold

关闭.restart 开启.unhold 重启.hold

replies.author: wuyayun0905
replies.txt_content: 已经解决了  但还是谢谢
